dcterms:description: A dataset encompassing various seasonality features that influence passenger demand, including temporal aspects such as day of the week, week of the year, and holiday occurrences, along with flight details like origin and destination airports.

dcterms:creator: S. C. Wong

dcterms:description: A dataset providing fare closure information, indicating specific time ranges during which certain fare classes or prices are unavailable for booking, which helps in understanding the dynamic nature of fare availability.
dcterms:title: Fare Closure Information

dcterms:creator: P.-S. You
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes various seasonality features relevant to airline seat management, particularly for flights with multiple legs, aiding in dynamic pricing strategies.
dcterms:title: Seasonality Features

dcterms:description: A dataset used for model training that focuses on factor normalization for deep neural network models, enhancing the learning process by ensuring balanced feature contributions.
dcterms:title: Traffic Data for Model Training
